scripts.nstart: npm run client && npm run comments && npm run bus && npm run posts
scripts.server: npm run comments && npm run bus && npm run posts
scripts.sserver: concurrently "npm start --prefix comments" "npm run bus" "npm start --prefix posts"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix client" "npm start --prefix comments" "npm run bus" "npm start --prefix posts" "npm start --prefix query" "npm start --prefix moderation"
